Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root salamaehtools -e "SELECT i.id, i.invoice_number, i.total_usd, i.total_lbp, o.customer_id, COALESCE(SUM(p.amount_usd), 0) as paid_usd FROM invoices i INNER JOIN orders o ON i.order_id = o.id LEFT JOIN payments p ON p.invoice_id = i.id WHERE i.status IN (''issued'', ''paid'') GROUP BY i.id LIMIT 5;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root salamaehtools -e "SHOW INDEX FROM orders WHERE Key_name LIKE ''idx_orders%'';")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root salamaehtools -e "SELECT TABLE_NAME, ROUND((DATA_LENGTH + INDEX_LENGTH) / 1024 / 1024, 2) AS ''Size (MB)'', TABLE_ROWS FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = ''salamaehtools'' ORDER BY (DATA_LENGTH + INDEX_LENGTH) DESC;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root salamaehtools -e "SELECT COUNT(*) as invoice_count FROM invoices WHERE status IN (''issued'', ''paid'');")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root salamaehtools -e "SELECT COUNT(*) as order_count FROM orders;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root salamaehtools -e "SELECT payment_method, COUNT(*) as count, SUM(amount_usd) as total_usd FROM payments GROUP BY payment_method;")
